circumstances: Few minutes after takeoff from Tarapacá Airport, bound for Tres Esquinas, the three engine airplane caught fire and crashed in a dense wooded area located few km from the airport. SAR operations were quickly initiated but the burnt wreckage was found two days and a half later. All 16 occupants were killed.
probable_cause: For unknown reasons, the airplane suffered a sudden and severe in-flight fire, maybe due to the explosion of an engine.
